entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Drumheller
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Drumheller 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
